comment.author: Megan
comment.text: crooked Hillary wonders why she isn't 50 points ahead in the polls?........If the media did their jobs and reported the news on "ole Hillary, she'd be 50 points behind!

replies.author: Samantha
replies.text: If the media and government did their jobs, she'd have been disqualified long ago.

replies.author: Hayley
replies.text: Isn't that the truth Megan. Can we say Voter Fraud?? One is for America one isnt, this is no Brainer

replies.author: Rachel
replies.text: Trolls were instructed to post rediculous things to discourage us with false polling. Trump 2016

replies.author: Michael Lyne
replies.text: If they did their job she'd be behind bars not podiums
